mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CODE, SECRET_CHECK FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO, ( SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "TB_MEMBER" MEM WHERE MEM.MEMBER_NO = BOA.MEMBER_NO ) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_COMMENT" TBC WHERE TBC.BOARD_NO = BOA.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ) AS COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CODE, SECRET_CHECK FROM "TB_BOARD" BOA WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC) BOARD

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_BOARD" BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND LOWER(BOARD_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND LOWER(BOARD_CONTENT) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND ( SELECT LOWER(MEMBER_NICKNAME) FROM "TB_MEMBER" MEM WHERE BOARD.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO ) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')

SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CODE, SECRET_CHECK FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO, ( SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "TB_MEMBER" MEM WHERE MEM.MEMBER_NO = BOA.MEMBER_NO ) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_COMMENT" TBC WHERE TBC.BOARD_NO = BOA.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ) AS COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CODE, SECRET_CHECK FROM "TB_BOARD" BOA WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC) BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND LOWER(BOARD_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND LOWER(BOARD_CONTENT) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND LOWER(MEMBER_NICKNAME) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND ( SECRET_CHECK = 'N' OR (SECRET_CHECK = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) )

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO, ( SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "TB_MEMBER" MEM WHERE MEM.MEMBER_NO = BOA.MEMBER_NO ) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_CODE FROM "TB_BOARD" BOA WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

mapper.update: UPDATE "TB_BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_CODE FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_CODE FROM "TB_BOARD" BOA WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = '3' ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC) BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_CODE FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_CODE FROM "TB_BOARD" BOA WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = '1' ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC) BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
